website_summaries.verdict: The Motorola Moto G is a well-built phone for a great price on Boost Mobile, but its lack of LTE limits its appeal.
pros: Excellent build quality and speed for the price

customer_reviews.title: What a majestic phone, especially when it's less than 80 dollars.
customer_reviews.text: This phone is simply amazing for its price range. I've had the more expensive phones and I can safely say that I like this one the most. It has way less hiccups than the previous phones that I have own. Only thing I can complain about, is that you can't expand the memory on this.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy With Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my husband and he loves it. We live in a very rural area so finding cell phones that get reception from our home has been difficult over the years. It is crisp and clear with no dropped calls or "breaking Up" (think back to the "can you hear me now" era) The display is nice, as well as great sound quality. Apps open fast. He doesn't use his phone to play games, etc..but the grand kids do and there have been no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Rose

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for under $70
customer_reviews.text: Day 1 with phone So far, so good. Easy start-up & so far I like most features. Not overly bloated with crap apps & works fine. Great buy for under $70 Only thing I dislike is taking a screen grab is tough because you have to hit the volume key & it usually lowers the volume on screen & you get that across your image grab
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Great phone, but tiny storage volume
customer_reviews.text: Great: Battery life is amazing, it's fast, is viewable in direct sunlight. Google did a great job on providing a clean, bug free Android build for this device. Lame: However, 8GB it's ridiculously small for storage space. My actual usable storage space was about 6GB. Considering that I can buy flash memory in capacities of 64GB and 128GB for near $30~$40, being rationed out 6GBs is unreasonable. At the least there could have been a sdcard slot.
customer_reviews.author: IOI-655321

customer_reviews.title: Best phone ever...kicks Iphone around the block
customer_reviews.text: I might be biased for Motorola as my dad worked there for years as an electrical engineer but we all know that Motorola was in the crap hole for quite awhile when all it's competitors left it in the dust during the cell phone years...until now. This moto G is great. It has a very long battery life even when using apps and texting. I broke my original one's screen and so just bought another one. Make sure you take care of your baby phone and buy a case and screen protectors. you will love this phone. so wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: rdumas13

customer_reviews.title: My particular device had a slight battery calibration issue when ...
customer_reviews.text: My particular device had a slight battery calibration issue when it first arrived. This was resolved by charging it completely to 100% and leaving it plugged in for a few hours and draining it all the way down. I repeated the process once more. This fixed the problem in a few days. Beyond that one issue, I have had no other problems with this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Sleepless in the Carolinas

customer_reviews.title: Lives Up To Other Reviews.
customer_reviews.text: This phone is awesome soo far. I do a lot on phones, watching videos, listening to music, games you name it. I filled up this memory pretty fast. The down side like most phones there are apps that I don't need nor want and I can't uninstall them. Also they kill yo with updates. Another downside is Boost continues trying to activate my phone, I use Hangout app for my phone soi it's annoying if am gaming on the phone or texting and it stops working cause of a stupid activation....
customer_reviews.author: Thrifty Mommy

customer_reviews.title: ... G I've owned and I don't know why my stupid ass keeps giving them a second chance
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd moto G I've owned and I don't know why my stupid ass keeps giving them a second chance. This one like the previous two just decides to not turn on anymore after about 4 months of very light usage. I hardly made calls, rarely surfed the web for anything and never used my entire 2gb prepaid data. Texted a few hundred times. Then one morning. Its just dead. Doesn't charge, doesn't turn on. Avoid at all costs. Was nice while it worked, but not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Dankwood

customer_reviews.title: Keep Shopping
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this phone based on great product reviews, and I've been pretty disappointed so far. I've had a handful of smartphones and this one definitely has the most glitches/quirks. Very often while texting, my phone will close the text and put me back on the home screen - no clue why. Also, my Pandora app won't play in the background if I open any other app (email, texting, weather, etc) - I've heard this can be an Android issue, but I've never encountered it before.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie M.

customer_reviews.title: One of the best phones for newbies!
customer_reviews.text: My friend needed a phone that was easy to use, and because this one got pretty decent reviews I thought, what the heck. She loves it. It is probably one of the easiest phones outside of a flip phone. Not the best on the market, but definitely not the worst. Easy to learn.
customer_reviews.author: ShoeShark

customer_reviews.title: Purchased 4, 3 were great this one complete dud.
customer_reviews.text: This is the 4th Moto G I have purchased. The other 3 were excellent this one is a disaster. The home button has never worked. It is much slower than the others. I bought this to replace one that was dropped from less than 3 feet and shattered. This also filled up very quickly as it stands I can't update. I think it was an older model and required more files to make it function. Sometimes the ringer sounds when I get a call, sometimes it doesn't. The other 3 were fine I will be looking a replacement for this one.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: It's a great phone with so many features
customer_reviews.text: It's a great phone with so many features. Plus you can get all of this stuff at a great price!! Update: September 29, 2016 It's been a little over a year since I owned this phone and the earphone jack has not properly functioned for the past couple of weeks. Also, the phone is starts to become very hot to the point where it's uncomfortable to carry it in your pocket.. I guess it lasted for the price.
customer_reviews.author: CriticalReader

customer_reviews.title: He is happy with his new Moto G and says it is ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this phone for my husband. He has used Motorola cell phones for the past several years and will not own a different brand. He is happy with his new Moto G and says it is a very good phone. The only concern I have is that there is no sd card. If he needs more memory we will have to upgrade to a more expensive phone, but all in all the Moto G is worth the price we paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: D. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Moto G is the best for the price
customer_reviews.text: The moto g is STILL the best price for the powerful specs it has inside. The screen colors are vivid and the build quality doesn't feel nor look cheap. Still impressive in 2015 plus the latest Android firmware updates makes this a steal. One star deducted only because I wish the moto g was 5 inches like my Nexus 5.
customer_reviews.author: DarkAngelRafael

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we needed...
customer_reviews.text: This phone is exactly what we needed. It is more advanced that the one that we had, it has the latest android system and great performance... The best part of it... NO CONTRACT and low monthly price of $40 dollars with everything unlimited with no little letters... Beat that other companies! Thank you Boost Mobile!
customer_reviews.author: wal_y_fipe

customer_reviews.title: Phone Would Not Activate with Boost Mobile
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the phone tried to activate it online it would not go through, I called boost mobile tech support they walked me through a reset 3!!! times. then they tell me "well we have already notified Motorola about the issues we have add activating the MOTO G BUT the only resolution we is for you to go back to the store you ordered it from and exchange it" Amazon is sending me a replacement free of charge with 2 day shipping so i will give it 4 stars, plus i got to play with it for 2 days its a beautiful phone, great camera, lightening fast speed, if you ask me its almost too smart :-)
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: The Days Of Spending Hundreds On Smart Phones Are Over
customer_reviews.text: A great phone for the price. Camera leaves a little to be desired. Really this replaced my iPhone and the difference is negligible. There is little reason for most people to spend tons of money on smart phones anymore.
customer_reviews.author: J H

customer_reviews.title: yes this isn't the best phone on the market but for what it offers
customer_reviews.text: First of all, yes this isn't the best phone on the market but for what it offers, it comes through flying. I can do all my banking, tweeting, status updates, video watching, and internet surfing with ease. Even though it is a 3g phone, it's processor helps it be as fast as a 4g phone. I can't say much for gaming since I don't do a lot of mobile gaming. the battery does last me a day to a day and a half. Great phone for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: guillermo

customer_reviews.title: Used!
customer_reviews.text: Boost could not activate the phone because it was already registered. Apparently it's not unused so don't waste your time.
customer_reviews.author: vicky

customer_reviews.title: Solid!!!
customer_reviews.text: When I began shopping for a new phone, I had my doubts. I didn't want to spend a lot of money. I wanted one that could handle my multi-tasking. Most importantly I wanted one that would not cause my apps to crash on a consistent basis. The Moto G satisfies everyone of those desires. It's fast. It's inexpensive as far as good smartphones go. And I have not had an app crash. The Moto G is very solid with the Gorilla glass, and it has an incredible display. Looking for a good smartphone on a tight budget? The Moto G is your best choice.
customer_reviews.author: jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Really. Can't believe how good this phone is
customer_reviews.text: I think it would be easier to tell you what i don't like thin what i do like........It's just nothing is coming to mind right now....Then to find out it's water resistant too ...wow. I haven't had a Motorola in 12 years. Happy I went back.
customer_reviews.author: Everette

customer_reviews.title: I brought it for my son. It's is first ...
customer_reviews.text: I brought it for my son. It's is first phone, and he enjoys it. I can't peel it out of his hand. What to expect he's a teenager? lol. Seriously, he's had it for a year and has not complained or had any trouble.
customer_reviews.author: DONESSA D.

customer_reviews.title: Decent Phone!
customer_reviews.text: It's a sexy phone for the price. No SD card, no LTE, no removable battery. Still a great phone though nice material. FM RADIO!
customer_reviews.author: Xochitl Sandoval

customer_reviews.title: ... to spend a bunch of money in those expensive smart phones. I love this phone
customer_reviews.text: It makes not sense to spend a bunch of money in those expensive smart phones. I love this phone. I had an HTC Evo and this phone by far out performed it. Great sound, screen and sound, lighting fast. The battery last a whole day.
customer_reviews.author: SVVV

customer_reviews.title: I don’t know
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know about this product I gave it to someone else
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: This phone looks good but boost is nearly impossible to activate this one
customer_reviews.text: This phone looks good but boost is nearly impossible to activate this one, let alone port number and contact info. Was not happy at all .
customer_reviews.author: wolf

customer_reviews.title: I like the reception on calls and better than average battery ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the reception on calls and better than average battery life. I also like the size because I am not a fan of those larger tablet like phones. For the the price it has a lot of other phones beat in terms of performance. The processor is faster than my old one(HTC oneV) and that is a welcomed improvement. I think the pictures are good but my old phone took better pictures. Overall I think I think this phone is a good value and much un rated in comparison to others
customer_reviews.author: henry garcia

customer_reviews.title: Dont pass by, this is a great phone
customer_reviews.text: Unbeatable product for unbeatable price. No waiting in line at the boost store or fighting to beat the rush at "upgrade time"
customer_reviews.author: Josh n Family

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: Love this phone, its affordable and easy to use. I had an iPhone previously, so I was worried it would be a big step down. It doesn't do everything that the iPhone did but if you want an easy, glitch free, nice looking phone this is for you. It upgrades to the most current software. Great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent phone!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this phone! I bought it to replace the Nexus S and it is awesome. Very fast phone for email, Facebook and all the apps! Highly recommend this phone. You really can't beat it for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Letellier

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product!!
customer_reviews.text: Thank you! Thank you!! Thank you!!! Quality Product and they sold what was advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great phone :D
customer_reviews.text: Love this phone! upgraded from a knockoff, and it reminds me of my Galaxy S5. so yes, I'm super happy with this purchase! battery not removable!
customer_reviews.author: KayJay

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Ive gone through several of these. Cant beat them for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Cerbius

customer_reviews.title: Not top of the line,but for the price, its top of the line
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for the price well below other model with less memory and performance capabilities stock out of the box, good performance for a 3g phone, almost as fast as 4g. YouTube,videos,games,no problem.Not top of the line,but for the price,its top of the line.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Morgan

customer_reviews.title: I was not a heavy user like music and downloads ect
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this phone on September 19, 2014. It quit working on November 20th, 2014. I only used the phone for talk text and some web. I was not a heavy user like music and downloads ect. I see no reason why it should have stopped working. I updated my phone after my Samsung Transform Ultra quit working after 3 years. I am very disappointed in this phone.
customer_reviews.author: leesa abbott

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BUY
customer_reviews.text: SET UP EASY, UPDATE TO ANDROID 4.4.4 WORKS GREAT. WHAT A DEAL. Update!! Had phone now for 3 years plus. Great phone. Good battery life. Never drops a call.
customer_reviews.author: STRAIT

customer_reviews.title: audio quality is great, and HD video looks unbelievably sexy
customer_reviews.text: The phone is sleek, audio quality is great, and HD video looks unbelievably sexy. There were issues while setting it up, but once those issues were resolved, the device worked great. There are still slight issues: such as lagging, random freezing, and random resets; but these issues are rare. The Moto G is a great budget device that competes with top-of-the-line smartphones.
customer_reviews.author: E. Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Works great and got it in a fast time frame after ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great and got it in a fast time frame after breaking my original one. So far so good and love the camera quality and music or video play back not so bad. Also the speaker phone is OK can be some what low and hard to hear however, not something I use a whole lot of so not a big deal to me. Therefore, based on the price you get great quality smart phone.
customer_reviews.author: Mellissa   Rudd

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The good - Durable phone. The bad - Cannot remove the battery and cannot add a card.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Gift for mom
customer_reviews.text: Got as gift for mom and she doesn't really care too much for the best in technology but I like getting her the best bang for her buck and that is what the Moto G is. The screen alone let's it feel like her phone is in the $250+ price range. The phone feels solid and as a nexus 5 owner, I recommend this to anyone on a tight budget.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo Delira

customer_reviews.title: The phone I've always wanted
customer_reviews.text: so far everything's running smoothly. it doesn't take a 1000 years to load an app and doesn't crash once its opened. this phone is a dream come true in comparison to my old phone.
customer_reviews.author: Jasalynja

customer_reviews.title: TING TING TING TING...LOL
customer_reviews.text: TING TING TING!!!!! This phone is for my daughter who primarily texts. I activated phone on TING with NO issues no hassels. I even ported the phone number from Kajeet, no issues, and done quickly. I believe you could also use this phone on Kajeet, though I had already activated it on TING, so I could not confirm it. First impressions...I like this phone. Clear crisp screen, touch is excellent, quick to respond, so far a very nice phone. Hope to update review in a month or two. I can refer a friend for credit for both of us, so just ask me. MAIN: you CAN activate directly with TING. I did it through the computer.
customer_reviews.author: RadRick

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: 3rd phone of this model, first time ordering one from amazon. Fast, expected product was as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Webb

customer_reviews.title: Great budget Android phone
customer_reviews.text: Great budget Android phone, love the little light that tells you have a message. The accelerometer is starting to drag as of 10/14.
customer_reviews.author: adolph

customer_reviews.title: We love this phone
customer_reviews.text: I have one, now my girlfriend has one. We love this phone, she used to have the IPhone 5, and she's much happier with Her Moto G!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Moorman

customer_reviews.title: Motorola has won me over
customer_reviews.text: Best phone I've ever owned. Coming from an LG phone then a Samsung Galaxy s3 to Motorola, I'll never go back. Motorola phones have impressed me.
customer_reviews.author: Some MAGA Dude

customer_reviews.title: Fast Shipping, Great Customer Service, Prices are Good. I would Highly Recommend....
customer_reviews.text: Fast Shipping, Great Customer Service, Prices are Good. I would Highly recommend....
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Have had it going on 6 months and it still works great!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these phones. Arrived on time! Have had it going on 6 months and it still works great!
customer_reviews.author: TwitteryBat727

customer_reviews.title: Motorola and Google nailed it with this one!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome phone! Even though it is only 3G, it is still packed with all the great features of a smartphone that is @ least three times the cost! It upgrades out of the box to Androids latest KitKat platform!! I highly recommend this phone!
customer_reviews.author: James Rinehart

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected. Nice amount of battery life but the camera sucks. Good call quality and lots of storage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good phone
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice phone for the price I have no problems with it . it was for my daughter she is rough on phones so this is a good one
customer_reviews.author: Mario

customer_reviews.title: Not clearly stated
customer_reviews.text: Was not clearly stated that this was not a 4G phone. Only 3G services worked. Bought this item and had no use for it. Essentially wasted money.
customer_reviews.author: ashii33

customer_reviews.title: Moto G is Awesome !
customer_reviews.text: I love it !!!! I ordered for next day delivery and got it a week later due to the extreme weather because obviously it came from no mans land, I was pissed but however the phone made up for the wait. I definitely should have been reimburse d for the shipping but I love the phone...its fast with new Kit Kat update... All in all the phone is great for the price...Love It !!!
customer_reviews.author: Fresh & Beautiful by Katikoo

customer_reviews.title: Works on Ting!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: works on Ting! very responsive long battery life hands down the best bang for the buck Minor Gripes: 4.5" screen (I have big hands) can't swap battery (I like to have a spare) Edit: I purchased this phone on July 13, 2014. I have been using my Moto G for about a year and a half. Recently it has become increasingly unstable, e.g. 1) Apps have started crashing 2) Sometimes when I reboot, I'll have to wait for it to optimize the apps Overall it has been an excellent phone; No regrets.
customer_reviews.author: Tag

customer_reviews.title: The best for $50
customer_reviews.text: This phone is great! It is perfect for a Wi-Fi phone. The 720p screen is great for watching YouTube and Twitch. The phone doesn't have the greatest storage, but if that's not what you're looking for in a $50 phone, you will be pleasantly surprised by what this phone is capable of.
customer_reviews.author: William Borum

customer_reviews.title: GOOD BUY
customer_reviews.text: It's a very good phone. Takes really good pictures and the sound quality is really clear. I've had the phone about 6 or 7 weeks and the battery seems to last a couple of days without charging. The battery is not removable but dose charge pretty quick. Overall I think it was a good price for $80.00.
customer_reviews.author: gary monson

customer_reviews.title: Phone does not charge
customer_reviews.text: Took the phone out of packaging plugged it in to charge and it will not charge
customer_reviews.author: Brendan

customer_reviews.title: Good cellphone
customer_reviews.text: The moto g is very fast and had a nice camera but something bad for me, the battery is not removable and you also can't add micro SD. I don't like that function couse remind me the iPhone.
customer_reviews.author: enoc

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: first time smart phone user this phone meets and goes beyond my expectations
customer_reviews.author: David J. Acevedo

customer_reviews.title: I love my new 3g
customer_reviews.text: I love my new 3g..Moto..but there is a minor problem the sound coming from the speaker"..sometimes..seems to have problems with volume .& my phone can be "super sensitive".. It has auto dial some of my friends & family a number of times..?? Other than that I enjoy " moto". Ciao"
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: I love this Moto G cell phone
customer_reviews.text: I love my Boost Moto G cell phone...I've had it since July 2014 and not one single problem.
customer_reviews.author: Alwaysbuyfromamazon

customer_reviews.title: the best phone I have ever owned!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone a few days ago and so far so good! It's very fast ,calls are very clear! I would recommend this phone to anyone!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: my favorite phone by far. until I dropped it in a toilet. :( would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Chasidy B

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone, its fast, strong and helps me get this done alot faster then most phones that I have had in the past. The only fault is that there is no slot for a Micro SD, which limits me to somethings. I would recommend it to people because its cheap and a good buy for technology.
customer_reviews.author: John Menjivar

customer_reviews.title: ... the Motorola G for a month now and it's perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: I've now had the Motorola G for a month now and it's perfect for my needs. For 45 dollars couldn't be happier. I can surf the web, text, make calls.....great coverage......very durable....... looking to purchase another one for my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew bailey

customer_reviews.title: ... was the last one and was screwwed on it great product
customer_reviews.text: i ordered it you shipped it even it beening the last one ive ordered a game and it was the last one and was screwwed on it great product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Very good on MotoG. Probably don't need it as the phone has great scratch resistance. Will buy again when\if needed.
customer_reviews.author: eric

customer_reviews.title: Yes great phone the picture is absolutely amazing
customer_reviews.text: Yes great phone the picture is absolutely amazing, And the phone runs very very smooth battery is as they said . No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Cee Cee

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Phone was ok while it lasted a few glitches off & on. Did not even last a year...
customer_reviews.author: kerns

customer_reviews.title: Locked-in to Boost
customer_reviews.text: This phone can no longer be activated on other providers.
customer_reviews.author: Example

customer_reviews.title: Love this phone
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe how treat this phone is. I have had it one month and for the price it is awesome! Great picture & sound quality. Easy access to emails and easy to operate.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Mobley

customer_reviews.title: Came in great condition
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone a while ago and when it first came it looked like a new phone but had little scratches on the sides but it was barely noticable.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Moto G is GREAT
customer_reviews.text: Its not for everyone but at the price for 100 and just with the kit kat update it will do the task for my needs. Finally a phone that's just right. Great back up or everyday user.
customer_reviews.author: frankie b guillermo

customer_reviews.title: Simple but good.
customer_reviews.text: It got here within a few days and it was easy to set up, but I've had this phone before and it cracks easily. So make sure to get a case when buying this!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Kersey

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love my phone. My old phone was done for. With this phone I switched all my messages contacts music pictures and call logs straight to this phone I can even write my papers on this phone.
customer_reviews.author: arionna hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Shipped with a dead pixel. Seriously?
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, didn't realize it had a dead pixel until after inactivated it. This is a very important phone so I'm not able to RMA it. Fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Alan Gibson

customer_reviews.title: great. terrific
customer_reviews.text: It's a great phone. The only things bad about it is. This person gave me the phone knowing the the vibration do not work. And I don't like the way the front camera changes the color of the picture. Other than that. It's a great phone
customer_reviews.author: nasha

customer_reviews.title: everything is fantastic about this phone.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent phone. Loving it. Head phone jack are designed for two ringed head phones without microphones. Three ringed ones (with microphones) will not fit correctly. Other than that everything is fantastic about this phone.
customer_reviews.author: KARTHIKRAMAS

customer_reviews.title: Smart phone technology for a great price
customer_reviews.text: This is my first smart phone, so I cant' really speak with great authority, but it's been a great starter phone for me. At less than $100.00, it really offers a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Nancie Vanture

customer_reviews.title: Awesome phone for the price
customer_reviews.text: Ive had this phone a week now. This phone is great. Its so smooth running and does multiple pages. Love the gorilla glass. Looks really nice. Has lots of storage space. I use this phone a lot for internet and games battery is holding juice well so far. havent done a lot of picture taking with it but does good so far. Great price. Awesome phone.
customer_reviews.author: c j

customer_reviews.title: Go Moto!
customer_reviews.text: This phone is well worth the price. Love the look.Phone were purchased for my 16 and 20 year old grandsons...they love them!
customer_reviews.author: mz T

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife. She likes it very much.
customer_reviews.author: blizz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great phone. Limited storage but not an issue for me. User friendly Droid.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Ludwigsen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's the only phone I can find that can receive calls at my home. Well worth it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome phone
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone for my husband. It is a great phone and he loves. Thanks Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Barb F

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: I simply love this phone. The photos it takes are awesome. Recommend it to anyone. Best Boost Mobile phone I have ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I bought the phone for my teenage son and he ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought the phone for my teenage son and he loves it. He can't believe how fast the apps load.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Thompson

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Bought this phone in June.it won't let me put service on.I'm being told that the phone is stolen.
customer_reviews.author: Antoniette Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the phones as a gift for two of my daughters
customer_reviews.author: Velvie

customer_reviews.text: I love this phone the only thing I didn't appreciate not knowing about the phone is the sim cards that u have to purchase on your own but other than that I give it 5 stars

customer_reviews.title: Boost Mobile Moto G
customer_reviews.text: Nice phone, purchased it for my son the only thing I didn't like was that it doesn't have a micro SD slot to expand the memory.
customer_reviews.author: Melvin Caban

customer_reviews.title: Great Device, Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this phone for about 3 months and its actually my first smart phone. I did a load of reading before I settled on this phone. For the price, it's a really an amazing device. It is very stable and very quick to open apps and games. No crashing or locking up. Storage is on the small side, but it isn't a concern of mine. I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Boost moto G
customer_reviews.text: This phone is perfect, just the right size very clear and fast. I think I will keep this one for awhile.
customer_reviews.author: John Shute

customer_reviews.title: I checked reviews and it appeared a good phone but ended up returning it even the replacement ...
customer_reviews.text: Kept playing music in the background that only the person could hear on his end of the phone when using it...this was a gift so I didn't do well with this one! I checked reviews and it appeared a good phone but ended up returning it even the replacement did the exact same thing so no more Moto G
customer_reviews.author: Niki Loftus

customer_reviews.text: Great phone for the price. I never have any problems with it and the battery lasts all day.

product_meta.title: Moto G Black (Boost Mobile)
product_meta.description: Moto G is designed for all the things you want to do - taking and sharing photos, watching videos, checking scores, getting directions, listening to music, you name it. This phone is smart and stylish, inside and out.

5MP rear camera, plus front facing camera
